overview: According to the plot of the film, a young man named Vasya, a native of the village, decided to change his life, but brings on a lot of problems. He is kind, open-hearted, knows how to stand up for himself and is not afraid of anyone, but he promised his friend, a Chinese, to give the flash card to his father. This flash drive is being hunted by bandits who also need it.
title: Хаамаайы Бааска 2
